quotations.quotation: I slept and dreamt that life was joy. I awoke and saw that life was service. I acted and behold, service was joy.
quotations.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotations.quotation: Faith is the bird that feels the light when the dawn is still dark.
quotations.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotations.quotation: You can't cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water.
quotations.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotations.quotation: Let your life lightly dance on the edges of Time like dew on the tip of a leaf.
quotations.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotations.quotation: The butterfly counts not months but moments, and has time enough.
quotations.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotations.quotation: Everything comes to us that belongs to us if we create the capacity to receive it.
quotations.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotations.quotation: A mind all logic is like a knife all blade. It makes the hand bleed that uses it.
quotations.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotations.quotation: You may not control all the events that happen to you, but you can decide not to be reduced by them.
quotations.author: Maya Angelou

quotations.quotation: Caring for myself is not self-indulgence, it is self-preservation, and that is an act of political warfare.
quotations.author: Audre Lorde

quotations.quotation: Dreams and reality are opposites. Action synthesizes them.
quotations.author: Assata Shakur

quotations.quotation: There are opportunities even in the most difficult moments.
quotations.author: Wangari Maathai

quotations.quotation: No person has the right to rain on your dreams.
quotations.author: Marian Wright Edelman
